mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reviewReply (review_no, reply, reply_id) VALUES (#{reviewNo}, #{reply}, #{replyId})
mapper.select: SELECT r.*, u.user_nick FROM reviewReply r JOIN users u ON r.reply_id = u.user_nick WHERE r.review_no = #{reviewNo} ORDER BY r.reply_no DESC LIMIT #{paging.pageStart}, #{paging.cpp}
